title: Manarola - The Jewel of Cinque Terre

seo.title: Manarola 2025 | Complete Guide to Cinque Terre's Most Iconic Village
seo.description: Discover Manarola, famous for sunset views, colorful houses, and the Via dell'Amore. Your complete guide to accommodation, dining, and attractions.

body.title: Welcome to Manarola
body.subtitle: The most photographed village in Cinque Terre, famous for spectacular sunsets, pastel-colored houses, and world-renowned wine production.

features.title: World-Famous Sunsets
features.description: Watch the sun paint the colorful houses in golden light from the harbor rocks.

features.title: Most Photographed Village
features.description: The iconic view of stacked houses is recognized worldwide as the image of Cinque Terre.

features.title: Sciacchetr√† Wine
features.description: Home to ancient vineyards producing the prized sweet wine of the region.

features.title: Via dell'Amore
features.description: The romantic coastal path connecting Manarola to Riomaggiore.

features.title: Historic Churches
features.description: Visit the 14th-century Church of San Lorenzo with its Gothic rose window.

features.title: Swimming & Diving
features.description: Rocky swimming spots and crystal-clear waters perfect for cliff jumping.
